content: with a slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet round 4 chain 3 3 double_crochet in same corner * chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next corner repeat from * 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet in 1st corner chain 2 join with a slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet do not fasten_off palm row 1 chain 3 counts as double_crochet *double_crochet in each of next 3 double_crochet double_crochet in chain repeat from * 2x double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet double_crochet in corner turn 17 row 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet chain 5 skip next 5 double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet turn row 3 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in chain-5 space double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet turn row 4 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn row 5-6 repeat row 4 row 7 with right sides together slip_stitch to the far end of the granny in the inside loops fasten_off wrist turn right side out and figure out which is the bottom for the right or left mitt that you are working round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the right corner of the granny chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet double_crochet in corner of granny work 10 double_crochet evenly across the palm join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 24 round 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st *fpdc half_double_crochet repeat from * 12x fpdc join with a slip_stitch in half_double_crochet rounds 3-4 repeat round 2 round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *fpsc single_crochet repeat from * 12x fpsc join with a slip_stitch round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch round 7 chain 1 *slip_stitch in next st chain 1 repeat from * 22x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off granny fingerless gloves by jamyri designs page 4 fingers round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the right corner of the granny chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet double_crochet in corner of granny work 10 double_crochet evenly across palm join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 24 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch round 3 chain 1 *slip_stitch chain 1 repeat from * 22x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off thumb round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the thumb hole chain 3 counts as double_crochet work 11 double_crochet evenly around join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 12 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st decrease single_crochet in each of next 3 double_crochet decrease single_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 row 3 chain 1 *slip_stitch chain 1 repeat from * 8x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends large instructions
